PWPL

May 10, 2012

I’m pleased to announce that the Penn Working Papers in Linguistics volume 18.1 has just been published today. Volume 18.1 is the proceedings of PLC 35. I was both the issue editor for 18.1 (that’s a roving duty that Penn Linguistics graduate students carry out), and had a paper in this volume.

You can download and read all of the papers free of charge here.
